summary: BuildRequest has no explicit requirements. The request primarily constrains the change to a redeploy with no functional changes and no UI/UX/routing/storage-key/backend-signature changes. The diff shows code/metadata modifications, but the provided snippets are truncated, so functional impact cannot be conclusively verified from the evidence shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state metadata/version update (projectStateVersion increment and/or summary/existing_features changes) not requested as part of a “redeploy with no functional changes”.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states non-goal: no new features or refactors; only redeploy. Updating project_state.json appears to introduce non-deployment metadata changes beyond redeploy steps.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister source modifications in backend/main.mo during a redeploy-only request.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request constrains changes to redeployment without functional changes; modifying backend source risks functional/signature/storage-key changes. Due to truncation, the diff does not demonstrate that the changes are purely non-functional (e.g., comments/formatting only).
